1.title: Freelance Developer
1.description: I designed and developed web applications using technologies like TypeScript, React, and TailwindCSS, as well as desktop applications with Python. Integrated databases such as PostgreSQL and SQLite. Delivered customized solutions that met specific client requirements, ensuring high quality standards and adherence to deadlines. Successfully completed over a dozen projects, achieving 100% client satisfaction.

2.title: SQL Programmer
2.description: Developed databases for the comprehensive management of material, human, and logistical resources. Applied innovative solutions that optimized operational performance by 40% and facilitated strategic decision-making. Designed and implemented data structures allowing fast and easy access to relevant information. Improved planning and operational management.

3.title: Development Lead and Python Programmer
3.description: Led an innovative project focused on data analysis and identification of key indicators for the tourism sector in Cuba. Used Python to develop a robust and efficient system. Coordinated a multidisciplinary team working on analytical tools designed to optimize strategic decision-making. Provided beneficiary institutions with access to critical data and detailed analyses, facilitating the identification of trends and patterns in the tourism sector. The project continues to be fundamental in improving decision quality for tourism agencies, allowing them to adjust strategies and respond more effectively to market dynamics.

4.title: Junior Python Developer
4.description: Participated in the development of enterprise solutions using Odoo at Merchise Austrement, contributing to process optimization and enterprise solutions. Integrated modules and streamlined workflows.

5.title: Full Stack Developer
5.description: Developed a web application for a private clinic. Designed and implemented innovative frontend and backend solutions to ensure an exceptional user experience. Conducted requirements gathering, complete documentation of the project lifecycle, cost and time estimation. This platform will become the core of the clinic's business model, optimizing appointment, client, and specialist management, ensuring efficient and smooth operations.

6.title: Full Stack Developer
6.description: Developed a web application for managing university student enrollment at an educational institution in Cienfuegos. Designed and implemented a comprehensive solution that significantly optimized enrollment processing times by over 50%. Enhanced logistics and the experience for both students and administrative staff. Facilitated data management, enabling quick and efficient access to necessary information, resulting in a smoother, more organized workflow.

7.title: Marketing Agent
7.description: News dissemination, web content creation, and social media advertising. Led and organized multidisciplinary teams to maximize profitability and company visibility, implementing effective strategies that generate a significant impact on reach and engagement with the target audience. Contributed to brand growth and strengthening of their digital presence.
